title: Master Of All Trades
description: An online community where anyone can learn anything. Novice and expert sharing advice and experience. Create an account, pick your interests, and start posting.

title: Good Cuisine
description: Search and save recipes based on your preferences, and dietary needs. Create a free account to save and track these recipes.

title: Pack It
description: Know what the weather will be like at your travel destination, and let Pack It suggest clothes you'll need for any situation. Add and pack items in your own virtual "Suitcase".

title: In Good Spirits
description: Throwing a party, need something new for New Years, or just bored on a Friday? Let us suggest random cocktails. We'll tell you what you need and what to do, all In Good Spirits.

title: Profile Generator
description: This is a node application using inquirer, and pdf-puppeteer to create a "team" profile based on the input of the user. The CLI prompts the user with questions and once they are done produces a pdf with the user's input.
